manual_section_quickstart_content: Welcome to BotMatrix. This system supports unified management and scheduling of multiple bot protocols (such as OneBot, KOOK, Telegram, etc.).
manual_section_docker_content: You can easily deploy and manage bot instances through the Docker interface. Supports viewing logs, restarting, stopping, and deleting containers.
manual_section_routing_content: Routing rules allow you to distribute tasks to specific Workers based on message content, source group, or bot ID.
manual_section_users_content: The system supports multi-user permission management. Administrators can create new users, reset passwords, and manage user status.

group_manager_get_default_rules_failed: Failed to get default group rules
group_manager_help_msg:
üõ°Ô∏è Group Management Help:
- rules: View group rules
- help: View this help
- kick <ID> [Blacklist]: Kick user
- ban <ID> [Minutes]: Ban user
- unban <ID>: Unban user
- addadmin <ID>: Set as administrator
- deladmin <ID>: Revoke administrator
- setrules <Content>: Modify group rules
- addword [Level] <Word>: Add sensitive word
- delword <Word>: Delete sensitive word
- members: View member list
- memberinfo <ID>: View member details
- settitle <ID> <Title>: Set special title

echo_plugin_desc: Echo plugin, automatically replies with the message you sent
echo_help_msg: This is an echo plugin. Send any message and it will reply to you as is.
music_plugin_desc: Music plugin, supporting search and on-demand songs
music_help_msg:
Music command format:
/Music <Song Name> - Search and play songs
/music <Song Name> - Search and play songs
Example: /Music Jay Chou - Qing Tian
weather_plugin_desc: Weather query plugin, supporting weather queries for various locations
weather_help_msg:
Weather command format:
/Weather <City> - Query weather for a specific city
/weather <City> - Query weather for a specific city
Example: /Weather Beijing
translate_help_msg:
Translation command format:
/Translate <Text> - Translate specified text
/translate <Text> - Translate specified text
Example: /translate Hello world
utils_plugin_desc: Utility plugin, providing common small tools
